nodes.text: Griggs Pe'et was a Balosar who met Han Solo at Kislov's Gambling Palace in 0 ABY. Pe'et wanted Solo to get a "valuable shipment" from an Imperial satellite. When asked what the shipment was, Pe'et said that it was "not a concern of Solo's." Ferus Olin, not Pe'et, really wanted Solo to go to the satellite. Ferus paid Pe'et, convincing Pe'et to get Solo to go to the satellite.
